ai-patthana19.2:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
ai-patthana19.2:1.1_0: There is no such thing as pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana19.2:2.1_0: Nor causes suffering to arise because of painful feeling,
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_0: Neutral feeling gives rise to neutral feeling ...
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_1: There is no such thing as pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_2: There is no such thing as painful feeling ...
ai-patthana19.2:4.1_0: Trial periods for one month, etc. ...
